member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer
member.summary: A utility class for serializing UI objects into Xaml such as controls and DependencyObjects. Understands concepts like Bindings, StaticResources, Styles, and Templates.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs a UiXamlSerializer.
member.param: Determines whether bindings will be serialized.
Determines whether unset dependency properties will be serialized.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.GetPropertyOrder(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Gets a string for a property used to determine the order in which properties will be serialized.
member.param: The property being serialized.
member.returns: A sortable string representation for the property.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.IsInlinable(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Determines whether the given property can be written inline (as an attribute) rather than using object-element syntax.
member.param: The object on which the property is being set.
The value of the property being set.
The identifier for the property being set (a PropertyInfo for a property, and the getter MethodInfo for an attached property).
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.PostSerialize(System.Object,System.String@)
member.summary: Called after serialization (and can be used for cleanup).
member.param: The object being serialized.
The serialized Xaml, which can be modified for cleanup during this method.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.PreSerialize(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called before serialization (and can be used for initialization).
member.param: The object being serialized.
The initial dictionary of prefixes, which can be primed for custom serializers.
The set of objects on the stack, which can be primed if certain objects must be avoided.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.ShouldSerialize(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether a property should be serialized (based upon the DefaultAttribute and ShouldSerialize methods).
member.param: The object being serialized.
The value of the property being serialized.
The property being serialized.
member.returns: true if the property should be serialized, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitAfterAttributes(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called after all properties that can be written as attributes (rather than in object-element syntax) are written, but before an object-element content is written. Use this virtual as an opportunity to inject additional attributes before the object is written.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitAfterBeginElement(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called immediately after the BeginElement for the object being serialized has been written.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitAlternateContent(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called when an object's Content property was not set, allowing special types (e.g. Templates) whose content properties are not discoverable publicly, to be serialized.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.summary: Serializes an attached property on an object.
member.param: The object on which the attached property is set.
The value of the attached property.
The name of the attached property.
The getter method for the attached property.
The setter method for the attached property.
The writer being used to serialize the object.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects currently on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitBeforeEndElement(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called immediately before the EndElement for the object being serialized is called. Can be used for cleanup.
member.param: The object being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitDictionaryContents(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Serializes the contents of a dictionary.
member.param: The dictionary being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitProperty(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Boolean,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Serializes a property.
member.param: The object on which the property is set.
The value of the property.
The property being set.
A value indicating that the property is the ContentProperty for the object, and thus no property elements need to be generated.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitPropertyPath(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Serializes a PropertyPath.
member.param: The path being serialized.
The name of the property being serialized.
The namespace for the property being serialized.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.VisitRootAttribute(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Called during attribute serialization on the root object. Can be used for global namespace declaration.
member.param: The root object.
The writer being used for serialization.
A mapping of xml namespaces to prefixes.
The set of objects on the stack (for cycle detection).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.UiXamlSerializer.CanWriteObject(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.Object})
member.summary: Checks to see whether an object can be serialized in Xaml.
member.param: The object to be serialized.
The set of objects currently on the stack (used to avoid cycles).
member.returns: true if the object can be serialized, false otherwise.

member.name: T:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.Phone.DerivedRelativeSource
member.summary: Provides a RelativeSource that can be instantiated in XAML without using curly-brace syntax (for pre-SL4 parsers).

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.Phone.DerivedRelativeSource.#ctor(System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The source RelativeSource.

member.name: M:SLaB.Utilities.Xaml.Serializer.UI.Phone.DerivedRelativeSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
